source_id: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_015_chunk6
evidence_span: Hydrogen concentrations in finished tubes have been reduced by a factor of three through the optimization of manufacturing processes and the implementation of new technology.
process_step: manufacturing processes optimization, implementation of new technology

source_id: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_015_chunk6
evidence_span: Multiple vacuum arc melting, use of selected raw materials, and intermediate ingot surface conditioning have resulted in much improved fracture toughness through the reduction of chlorine and phosphorus concentrations.
process_step: Multiple vacuum arc melting, use of selected raw materials, intermediate ingot surface conditioning
